statements: DELETE FROM electronic_health_records WHERE patient_id = 100 AND patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM electronic_health_records WHERE patient_gender = 'M' AND diagnosis = 'COVID-19' AND admission_date >= '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 100 AND patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 200 AND record_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 5 AND name = 'John Doe';
